recipes.name: Classic Espresso
recipes.description: A concentrated form of coffee brewed by forcing a small amount of nearly boiling water under pressure through finely ground coffee beans.
steps: Grind coffee beans to a fine consistency
Tamp the grounds evenly in the portafilter
Lock the portafilter into the espresso machine
Serve immediately in a pre-warmed cup

recipes.name: Cappuccino
recipes.description: An espresso-based coffee drink that originated in Italy, and is traditionally prepared with steamed milk foam.
steps: Dust with cocoa powder if desired

recipes.name: Pour Over Coffee
recipes.description: A manual coffee brewing method that produces a clean, crisp cup of coffee with distinct flavors.
steps: Place filter in dripper and rinse with hot water
Add ground coffee and level the bed
Pour 60ml water and let bloom for 30 seconds
Slowly pour remaining water in circular motions
Wait for all water to drain through

recipes.name: Turkish Coffee
recipes.description: A traditional method of preparing coffee that originated in Turkey, known for its strong flavor and unique preparation method.
steps: Add water to the cezve (Turkish coffee pot)
Add coffee and sugar if desired
Remove from heat when foam rises
Pour into cups, including the foam

recipes.name: Cold Brew
recipes.description: A smooth, less acidic coffee made by steeping coarsely ground beans in cold water for an extended period.
steps: Combine coffee grounds and water in jar
Stir to ensure all grounds are wet
Cover and let steep for 12-24 hours
Dilute with water or milk to taste

recipes.name: Vietnamese Iced Coffee
recipes.description: A sweet and strong coffee drink made with dark roast coffee and sweetened condensed milk.
steps: Pour hot coffee over condensed milk

recipes.name: Affogato
recipes.description: An Italian dessert coffee made by pouring a shot of hot espresso over a scoop of vanilla ice cream.
steps: Place vanilla ice cream in serving glass
Pour hot espresso over ice cream

recipes.name: Moka Pot Coffee
recipes.description: A stovetop coffee maker that produces a strong, espresso-like coffee using steam pressure.
steps: Fill bottom chamber with hot water
Place on stove over medium heat
Remove from heat when coffee stops flowing

recipes.name: French Press Coffee
recipes.description: A brewing device that produces a rich, full-bodied coffee by steeping grounds in hot water.

recipes.name: Aeropress Coffee
recipes.description: A versatile brewing method that produces a clean, smooth cup of coffee using air pressure.
